title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the problem the Bills are having as they fall to the Buccaneers in overtime. He discusses the Cowboys escaping with a win over Washington and explains why QB Dak Prescott has not been playing up to expectations. He tells you why he was right about Justin Herbert but wrong about Urban Meyer as a NFL head coach. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl Champion and Fox Sports NFL analyst Jimmy Johnson joins the show to discuss Aaron Rodgers and Tom Brady still dominating the league this late in their careers.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
